dc_description_s: This line shapefile represents rivers in Nicaragua. The Global Map Nicaragua was developed from Mapa Topo Digital 250000, NicaraguaGlobal Map data were developed under the cooperation of National Geospatial Information Authorities (NGIAs) of respective countries and regions.
dc_publisher_s: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
dc_creator_sm: International Steering Committee for Global Mapping
